output.description:
<triage-output> <eventType>ServiceDown</eventType> <triageStatus>success</triageStatus> <triageData> <pingStatus>success</pingStatus> <notes><![CDATA[Triage Data:
Verifying target host availability... PING hostname (1.2.3.4) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from hostname (1.2.3.4): icmp_seq=1 ttl=128 time=0.812 ms 64 bytes fromhostname (1.2.3.4): icmp_seq=2 ttl=128 time=0.445 ms 64 bytes from hostname (1.2.3.4): icmp_seq=3 ttl=128 time=0.599 ms --- hostname ping statistics --- 3 packets transmitted, 3 received, 0% packet loss, time 2002ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 0.445/0.618/0.812/0.153 ms ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Verifying service status...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Triage successful.Process already stopped.In ITSM case no change will be created.Remediation and validation will not be carried out.]]></notes> <pid/> </triageData> <remediationRequired>true</remediationRequired> </triage-output>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootElementName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:element name="{$rootElementName}"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name()='adapter-name'"> <adapter-name> <xsl:value-of select="//ping-adapter-name/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </adapter-name> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="name()='invocation-mechanism'"> <invocation-mechanism> <xsl:value-of select="//ping-mechanism/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </invocation-mechanism> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//situationData/service"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:element name="{$nodeName}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//sourceData/componentType/text() = 'NT_SERVICES'"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), 'SERVICES_')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), "@")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(//sourceData/componentCaption/text(), '@')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//sourceData/componentCaption/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">---------------------- AO Host connection detials are not available. Can Not proceed.</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: No connection details available to proceed with triage actions.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">---------------------- No service name provided. Can not proceed. </xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Service name does not exist in input event data.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------- Verifying target host availability... $[ping]</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Tartget host connection details not available.Can not proceed. </xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: No connection data exists for the target.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(substring-after(., '.'))) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="translate(substring-after(., '.'), 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//service-name-mappings/service-name/@name='${service name}'"> <xsl:value-of select="//service-name-mappings/service-name[@name='${service name}']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${service name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}']/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="service"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}']/services/service/@name = '${service validation string}'">${service validation string}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host])"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host]/services/service[@name = $service]/search-string)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host]/services/service[@name = $service]/search-string/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'${service validation string}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains('${host name}', ".")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before('${host name}', ".")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${host name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${exit code}' = '0'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains('${os type}', 'windows')"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., "STATE")"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., "STOPPED")"> <xsl:value-of select="'stopped'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains(., "RUNNING")"> <xsl:value-of select="'running'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'unknown'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'notfound'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., 'running')"> <xsl:value-of select="'running'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'stopped'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${exit code}' = '1'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains('${os type}', 'windows')"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., "STATE")"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., "STOPPED")"> <xsl:value-of select="'stopped'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains(., "RUNNING")"> <xsl:value-of select="'running'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'unknown'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'notfound'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., '${service name}')"> <xsl:value-of select="'running'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'stopped'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">error</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java.lang.String" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="str1" select="substring-after(., ' ')" /> <xsl:variable name="str2" select="java:trim(java:new($str1))" /> <xsl:variable name="str3" select="substring-before($str2, ' ')" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${os type}' ='linux'"> <xsl:value-of select="$str3" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> ${command output} </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</xsl:text> $[triage data] <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Triage successful. Process is not running.</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output cdata-section-elements="action" indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <annotation-data> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//line)"> <xsl:for-each select="//line[.!='bash-2.03$']"> <xsl:if test="string(.)!="""> <xsl:value-of select="." /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </annotation-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------------------- </xsl:text> $[triage data] <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------------------- Triage error caused by an error or an unknown cause. No remediation will be performed. </xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output cdata-section-elements="action" indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <annotation-data> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//line)"> <xsl:for-each select="//line[.!='bash-2.03$']"> <xsl:if test="string(.)!="""> <xsl:value-of select="." /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </annotation-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------------------- </xsl:text> $[triage data] <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-------------------------------------- Triage successful. Service is running. No remediation will be performed. </xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="command command-output " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <triage-output> <status>${triage status}</status> <command>${command}</command> <command-output> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </command-output> <remediation-required>${remediation required}</remediation-required> <start-time>${start time}</start-time> <end-time>${end time}</end-time> </triage-output> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
